section.title: Monitoring your environmentRD_about_dashboard
section.para: The dashboard lets you monitor the overall health and security status of your environment and the connected devices.

itemizedlist.title: The dashboard provides the following information:

listitem.para: Detailed charts that report on KPI details and more

section.para: KPIs also report on changes over time. These changes can help you understand your larger threat landscape, changing patterns of user interaction, and more.

note.para: Because the dashboard reports on devices, you do not see any data until devices are enrolled in your environment.

itemizedlist.title: The KPIs provide the following information:

listitem.para: Lets you know about the users for which unusually high numbers of security events are detected.
Summarizes all security-related events in your environment.

section.para: The interactive charts in the dashboard provide data about devices and security trends. You can see how operating systems are distributed across devices, which devices are currently compromised, and more. You can export the data for reporting and analysis.
The Symantec Security Cloud News calendar keeps you informed about upgrades, maintenance windows, and other product information.
